Description: On US-360 in the County of Prince Edward, in the vicinity of Bruceville Rd; Rt. 701N/S (Lunenburg County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The west left lane is closed.

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 270 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The north right shoulder is closed.
